org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl

Class AbstractQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl.AbstractQuery
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractNodeQuery, BooleanQuery

    public abstract class AbstractQuery
extends Object
    Abstract class that represents a top-level query object of the JSON query syntax.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Return a JSON representation of the constructed query.

        The JSON representation is compatible with the JsonQueryParser.

        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the created query object cannot be converted to JSON.
